description: I would have to agree with with you! I HATE trying to debug my code only to find out that it was a simple spelling error!
Thats awesome! I am really happy for your career change!! This is a great field to be in
HEY! give yourself a little grace! That topic is very complex, and a tough one!
Everyone learns differently, but I would have to say that watching videos on whatever topic you want to master has helped me ALOT!
